channel.title: Chapter bugs
channel.description: If the hl2.exe is forced to quit or if it stops working, the chapter progression during that run is lost. However this can be fixed by loading an autosave, then when you go back to the chapter selection everything will be as normal. Great game btw!

item.title: Chapter bugs
item.dc:creator: Blank
item.description:
If the hl2.exe is forced to quit or if it stops working, the chapter progression during that run is lost. However this can be fixed by loading an autosave, then when you go back to the chapter selection everything will be as normal. Great game btw!

Read full topic
